instructions: Answer the following questions to the best of your ability. This test will help determine your current skill level and place you in the appropriate learning group.

questions.question: What is the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?
What are activation functions and why are they used in neural networks?
Explain the concept of overfitting in machine learning. How can it be prevented?
How does a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) differ from a fully connected network?
What is backpropagation and how does it work?
Describe the vanishing gradient problem and how architectures like LSTM address it.
